article_node.title: Tour Championship: Second round tee times, how to watch, leaderboard today
article_node.summary: Scottie Scheffler, the World No. 1 golfer, is currently competing in the 2025 Tour Championship, having shot a 7-under 63 in the first round, placing him just behind leader Russell Henley. The tournament, which is the final event of the PGA Tour's FedEx Cup Playoffs, has been adjusted to an earlier start time due to expected rain. Scheffler recently won the BMW Championship, solidifying his position as the top FedEx Cup points leader.
